name: remove_wasteland_dweller_limit
fullName: Allow unlimited dwellers in the wasteland.

name: remove_stimpacks_radaways_cap
fullName: Remove max stimpacks and radaways per dweller.

name: remove_wasteland_mrhandy_cap
fullName: Allow unlimited MrHandies in the wasteland.

name: skip_more_objectives_per_day
fullName: Skip as many objectives as you want.

name: rush_instant
fullName: Production room rushes are instant (no animation).

name: no_vault_dweller_limit
fullName: Remove max dweller cap based on living quarters count.

name: no_room_build_restrictions
fullName: Allows to build any room (does not depend on dweller count).
